pp1.7:2.2_0: Sakiṁ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā nimujjati, ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti, ummujjitvā
pp1.7:2.2_1: vipassati viloketi, ummujjitvā patarati, ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti, ummujjitvā
pp1.7:2.2_2: tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
pp1.7:3.1: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.
